details:
znirkel reports:

> The eval() function in \_reset\_post\_array crashes when posting
> certain data. By passing in carefully-crafted input data, the eval()
> function could also execute malicious PHP code.
>
> Note that CodeIgniter applications that either do not use the
> new Form Validation class or use the old Validation class are not
> affected by this vulnerability.
summary: codeigniter -- arbitrary script execution in the new Form Validation class
